pages.title: Scroll Forge
pages.text: Upon reaching nether level resources, you will unlock an entirely new dynamic to gaining power: The Scroll Forge$(br2)The Scroll Forge is used to craft scrolls by using ink, paper, and a focus. The ink determines the rarity (and therefore level), and the focus determines spell's school.

pages.title: New Spell Books
pages.text: Furthermore, intermediate spell books can be crafted using nether resources

pages.title: New Materials
pages.text: You should also start to craft stronger armor using arcane cloth. In order to get high quantities of arcane essence, you will need to focus on raiding magical structures.

pages.title: Rare Materials
pages.text: In order to continue progressing, keep an eye out for runestones in magical structures. Runestones are used to craft even more powerful armor. Class mages always drop a rune of their school.
